Quote.Author: Ivana Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: Gorgeous hair is the best revenge

Quote.Author: Ivana Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel young at heart, and I feel, like, you know, 40

Quote.Author: Ivana Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing my housekeeper does that I can't do - and maybe better!

Quote.Author: Ivana Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I want great food and wine, and friends to enjoy it all

Quote.Author: Ivana Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I can ski backwards on one ski. And foldblinded!

Quote.Author: Ivica Dacic
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no private life, as I am constantly under police surveillance

Quote.Author: Ivica Dacic
Quote.QuoteValue: The time of Milosevic has long passed

Quote.Author: Ivica Dacic
Quote.QuoteValue: How can a country that is impoverished, humiliated and beaten defend its national interests?

Quote.Author: Ivica Dacic
Quote.QuoteValue: No one can undermine national unity

Quote.Author: Ivica Dacic
Quote.QuoteValue: Serbia stands firmly on the EU path

Quote.Author: Ivica Dacic
Quote.QuoteValue: Serbia is blamed in advance for everything

Quote.Author: Ivica Dacic
Quote.QuoteValue: Serbia is open for business

Quote.Author: Ivica Dacic
Quote.QuoteValue: No one has the right to detract the attention of the nation from the defence of the country

Quote.Author: Ivica Dacic
Quote.QuoteValue: If Nord Stream was built in Europe, I see no reason why South Stream cannot be built as well

Quote.Author: Ivica Dacic
Quote.QuoteValue: For 10 years, Kosovo was taboo. No one could officially tell the truth

Quote.Author: Ivor Novello
Quote.QuoteValue: Love-making is an art which must be studied

Quote.Author: Ivor Novello
Quote.QuoteValue: Every blessed one of you feels better for that burst of laughter

Quote.Author: Ivor Novello
Quote.QuoteValue: Things which do not require effort of some sort are seldom worth having

Quote.Author: Ivor Novello
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot isolate yourself from the crowd - even if you want to

Quote.Author: Ivor Novello
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something Vichy about the French

Quote.Author: Ivor Novello
Quote.QuoteValue: After the war, in which I served as a pilot in the Air Force, I took up films

Quote.Author: Ivor Novello
Quote.QuoteValue: British girls are as temperamental as Americans

Quote.Author: Ivor Novello
Quote.QuoteValue: I began my career with infantile dreams of becoming a composer

Quote.Author: Ivor Novello
Quote.QuoteValue: The crowd may be influenced easily, largely because it is a crowd

Quote.Author: Ivor Novello
Quote.QuoteValue: There are very few misanthropes, thank goodness!

Quote.Author: Izaak Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: Good company in a journey makes the way seem shorter

Quote.Author: Izaak Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: Good company and good discourse are the very sinews of virtue

Quote.Author: Izaak Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: Angling may be said to be so like the mathematics that it can never be fully learned

Quote.Author: Izaak Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: God has two dwellings; one in heaven, and the other in a meek and thankful heart

Quote.Author: Izaak Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: The person that loses their conscience has nothing left worth keeping

Quote.Author: Izaak Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: Words are men's daughters, but God's sons are things

Quote.Author: Izaak Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: God never did make a more calm, quiet, innocent recreation than angling

Quote.Author: Izaak Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: As no man is born an artist, so no man is born an angler

Quote.Author: Izaak Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: I have laid aside business, and gone a'fishing

Quote.Author: Izaak Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: In so doing, use him as though you loved him

Quote.Author: Izabella Scorupco
Quote.QuoteValue: The most simple things can bring the most happiness

Quote.Author: Izabella Scorupco
Quote.QuoteValue: Sexual underwear is tacky

Quote.Author: Izabella Scorupco
Quote.QuoteValue: I was very athletic when I was younger and I am a very competitive person, so I never give up

Quote.Author: Izabella Scorupco
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never actually seen a Star Trek, but I have seen an Alien movie

Quote.Author: Izabella Scorupco
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been the sexy or the cute girl

Quote.Author: Izabella Scorupco
Quote.QuoteValue: He taught me how to fly on my own and learn the tricks

Quote.Author: Izabella Scorupco
Quote.QuoteValue: You're not really supposed to like ABBA in Sweden. It's nerdy

Quote.Author: Izabella Scorupco
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been comfortable with my sexual desires and what I like

Quote.Author: Izabella Scorupco
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so lucky to be in a situation that I can always have my daughter with me

Quote.Author: Izabella Scorupco
Quote.QuoteValue: I never work out. I think it is boring, so I run

Quote.Author: J. B. Priestley
Quote.QuoteValue: To different minds, the same world is a hell, and a heaven

Quote.Author: J. B. Priestley
Quote.QuoteValue: The more we elaborate our means of communication, the less we communicate

Quote.Author: J. B. Priestley
Quote.QuoteValue: Be yourself is about the worst advice you can give to some people

Quote.Author: J. B. Priestley
Quote.QuoteValue: She was a handsome woman of forty-five and would remain so for many years

Quote.Author: J. B. Priestley
Quote.QuoteValue: Perhaps it would be better not to be a writer, but if you must, then write

Quote.Author: J. B. Priestley
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy, we may say, is society protecting itself - with a smile

Quote.Author: J. B. Priestley
Quote.QuoteValue: Accidents, try to change them - it's impossible. The accidental reveals man

Quote.Author: J. B. Priestley
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage is like paying an endless visit in your worst clothes

Quote.Author: J. B. Priestley
Quote.QuoteValue: There are plenty of clever young writers. But there is too much genius, not enough talent

Quote.Author: J. B. Priestley
Quote.QuoteValue: We pay when old for the excesses of youth

Quote.Author: J. D. Salinger
Quote.QuoteValue: Its really hard to be roommates with people if your suitcases are much better than theirs

Quote.Author: J. D. Salinger
Quote.QuoteValue: Mothers are all slightly insane

Quote.Author: J. D. Salinger
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm quite illiterate, but I read a lot

Quote.Author: J. D. Salinger
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a kind of paranoid in reverse. I suspect people of plotting to make me happy

Quote.Author: J. D. Salinger
Quote.QuoteValue: How do you know you're going to do something, untill you do it?

Quote.Author: J. D. Salinger
Quote.QuoteValue: How long should a man's legs be? Long enough to touch the ground

Quote.Author: J. D. Salinger
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the most terrific liar you ever saw in your life

Quote.Author: J. D. Salinger
Quote.QuoteValue: All morons hate it when you call them a moron

Quote.Author: J. D. Salinger
Quote.QuoteValue: People never notice anything

Quote.Author: J. D. Salinger
Quote.QuoteValue: People never believe you

Quote.Author: J. Paul Getty
Quote.QuoteValue: The meek shall inherit the Earth, but not its mineral rights

Quote.Author: J. Paul Getty
Quote.QuoteValue: My wealth is not a subject I relish discussing

Quote.Author: J. Paul Getty
Quote.QuoteValue: Formula for success: rise early, work hard, strike oil

Quote.Author: J. Paul Getty
Quote.QuoteValue: The employer generally gets the employees he deserves

Quote.Author: J. Paul Getty
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot further the Brotherhood of Man by encouraging class hatred

Quote.Author: J. Paul Getty
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can actually count your money, then you're not a rich man

Quote.Author: J. Paul Getty
Quote.QuoteValue: Money is like manure. You have to spread it around or it smells

Quote.Author: J. Paul Getty
Quote.QuoteValue: Oil is like a wild animal. Whoever captures it has it

Quote.Author: J. Paul Getty
Quote.QuoteValue: There are one hundred men seeking security to one able man who is willing to risk his fortune

Quote.Author: J. Paul Getty
Quote.QuoteValue: I buy when other people are selling

Quote.Author: J. R. R. Tolkien
Quote.QuoteValue: Still round the corner there may wait, A new road or a secret gate

Quote.Author: J. R. R. Tolkien
Quote.QuoteValue: Not all those who wander are lost

Quote.Author: J. R. R. Tolkien
Quote.QuoteValue: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world

Quote.Author: J. R. R. Tolkien
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage is found in unlikely places

Quote.Author: J. R. R. Tolkien
Quote.QuoteValue: The wide world is all about you: you can fence yourselves in, but you cannot forever fence it out

Quote.Author: J. R. R. Tolkien
Quote.QuoteValue: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens

Quote.Author: J. R. R. Tolkien
Quote.QuoteValue: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us

Quote.Author: J. R. R. Tolkien
Quote.QuoteValue: A box without hinges, key, or lid, yet golden treasure inside is hid

Quote.Author: J. R. R. Tolkien
Quote.QuoteValue: So comes snow after fire, and even dragons have their ending!

Quote.Author: J. R. R. Tolkien
Quote.QuoteValue: It does not do to leave a live dragon out of your calculations, if you live near him

Quote.Author: J. Robert Oppenheimer
Quote.QuoteValue: I am become death, the destroyer of worlds

Quote.Author: J. Robert Oppenheimer
Quote.QuoteValue: My childhood did not prepare me for the fact that the world is full of cruel and bitter things

Quote.Author: J. Robert Oppenheimer
Quote.QuoteValue: Access to the Vedas is the greatest privilege this century may claim over all previous centuries

Quote.Author: J. Robert Oppenheimer
Quote.QuoteValue: The optimist thinks this is the best of all possible worlds. The pessimist fears it is true

Quote.Author: J. Robert Oppenheimer
Quote.QuoteValue: Both the man of science and the man of action live always at the edge of mystery, surrounded by it

Quote.Author: J. Robert Oppenheimer
Quote.QuoteValue: Any man whose errors take ten years to correct is quite a man

Quote.Author: J. Robert Oppenheimer
Quote.QuoteValue: No man should escape our universities without knowing how little he knows

Quote.Author: J. Robert Oppenheimer
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother was born in Baltimore, and before her marriage, she was an artist and teacher of art

Quote.Author: J. Robert Oppenheimer
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is not everything, but science is very beautiful

Quote.Author: J. Robert Oppenheimer
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born in New York in 1904

Quote.Author: Ja Rule
Quote.QuoteValue: I got started in 1995, working in a group called The Cash Money Click

Quote.Author: Ja Rule
Quote.QuoteValue: These companies are in it for their dollars, and whatever is hot that is what they follow

Quote.Author: Ja Rule
Quote.QuoteValue: Pain is love

Quote.Author: Ja Rule
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only one me

Quote.Author: Ja Rule
Quote.QuoteValue: I've signed a few sneakers in my day

Quote.Author: Ja Rule
Quote.QuoteValue: Be very nervous of the shaky hands

Quote.Author: Ja Rule
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm married, I have three children, I never hit my wife

Quote.Author: Ja Rule
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to see my family together. That's what life is about. It's about family

Quote.Author: Ja Rule
Quote.QuoteValue: The public makes it so that we have to keep assaulting each other

Quote.Author: Ja Rule
Quote.QuoteValue: I got a cold feeling toward religion in general. I don't think God would want to separate families

Quote.Author: Jack Kerouac
Quote.QuoteValue: I had nothing to offer anybody except my own confusion

Quote.Author: Jack Kerouac
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe that's what life is... a wink of the eye and winking stars

Quote.Author: Jack Kerouac
Quote.QuoteValue: Whither goest thou, America, in thy shiny car in the night?

Quote.Author: Jack Kerouac
Quote.QuoteValue: Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads and popular opinion

Quote.Author: Jack Kerouac
Quote.QuoteValue: My witness is the empty sky

Quote.Author: Jack Kerouac
Quote.QuoteValue: Avoid the world, it's just a lot of dust and drag and means nothing in the end

Quote.Author: Jack Kerouac
Quote.QuoteValue: My manners, abominable at times, can be sweet

Quote.Author: Jack Kerouac
Quote.QuoteValue: My fault, my failure, is not in the passions I have, but in my lack of control of them

Quote.Author: Jack Kerouac
Quote.QuoteValue: All human beings are also dream beings. Dreaming ties all mankind together

Quote.Author: Jack Kerouac
Quote.QuoteValue: My father and my mother and my sister and I have always voted Republican, always

Quote.Author: Jack Kevorkian
Quote.QuoteValue: My ultimate aim is to make euthanasia a positive experience

Quote.Author: Jack Kevorkian
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd find it demeaning to be cleaning toilets

Quote.Author: Jack Kevorkian
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no regrets, none whatsoever

Quote.Author: Jack Kevorkian
Quote.QuoteValue: Five to six thousand people die every year waiting for organs, but nobody cares

Quote.Author: Jack Kevorkian
Quote.QuoteValue: The patient decides when it's best to go

Quote.Author: Jack Kevorkian
Quote.QuoteValue: Among doctors in general, I think more than half support what I'm doing

Quote.Author: Jack Kevorkian
Quote.QuoteValue: What looks like enjoyment is the sneer of contempt. That's not a smile

Quote.Author: Jack Kevorkian
Quote.QuoteValue: You can cite me for contempt, Your Honor. I don't care

Quote.Author: Jack Kevorkian
Quote.QuoteValue: Not one has shown an iota of fear of death. They want to end this agony

Quote.Author: Jack Kevorkian
Quote.QuoteValue: None of them want to delay. Understand that. None of them

Quote.Author: Jack London
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club

Quote.Author: Jack London
Quote.QuoteValue: Do you know the only value life has is what life puts on itself?

Quote.Author: Jack London
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is not a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well

Quote.Author: Jack London
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is so short. I would rather sing one song than interpret the thousand

Quote.Author: Jack London
Quote.QuoteValue: Affluence means influence

Quote.Author: Jack London
Quote.QuoteValue: San Francisco is gone. Nothing remains of it but memories

Quote.Author: Jack London
Quote.QuoteValue: The scab is a traitor to his God, his mother, and his class

Quote.Author: Jack London
Quote.QuoteValue: If cash comes with fame, come fame; if cash comes without fame, come cash

Quote.Author: Jack London
Quote.QuoteValue: Darn the wheel of the world! Why must it continually turn over? Where is the reverse gear?

Quote.Author: Jack London
Quote.QuoteValue: One cannot violate the promptings of one's nature without having that nature recoil upon itself

Quote.Author: Jack Ma
Quote.QuoteValue: Never give up. Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine

Quote.Author: Jack Ma
Quote.QuoteValue: When I am myself, I am happy and have a good result

Quote.Author: Jack Ma
Quote.QuoteValue: You should learn from your competitor, but never copy. Copy and you die

Quote.Author: Jack Ma
Quote.QuoteValue: The world needs new leadership, but the new leadership is about working together

Quote.Author: Jack Ma
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be liked. I want to be respected

Quote.Author: Jack Ma
Quote.QuoteValue: The very important thing you should have is patience

Quote.Author: Jack Ma
Quote.QuoteValue: A peace talk is always difficult, always complicated

Quote.Author: Jack Ma
Quote.QuoteValue: If Alibaba cannot become a Microsoft or Wal-Mart, I will regret it for the rest of my life

Quote.Author: Jack Ma
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want people in China to have deep pockets but shallow minds

Quote.Author: Jack Ma
Quote.QuoteValue: I want people to learn what democracy means

Quote.Author: Jack Nicholson
Quote.QuoteValue: There's only two people in your life you should lie to... the police and your girlfriend

Quote.Author: Jack Nicholson
Quote.QuoteValue: My motto is: more good times

Quote.Author: Jack Nicholson
Quote.QuoteValue: Beer, it's the best damn drink in the world

Quote.Author: Jack Nicholson
Quote.QuoteValue: With my sunglasses on, I'm Jack Nicholson. Without them, I'm fat and 60

Quote.Author: Jack Nicholson
Quote.QuoteValue: The minute that you're not learning I believe you're dead

Quote.Author: Jack Nicholson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want people to know what I'm actually like. It's not good for an actor

Quote.Author: Jack Nicholson
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is everybody's favorite second job

Quote.Author: Jack Nicholson
Quote.QuoteValue: Age is the first limitation on roles that I've ever had to encounter, and I hit that awhile ago

Quote.Author: Jack Nicholson
Quote.QuoteValue: Early on, if I was alone two three nights in a row, I'd start writing poems about suicide

Quote.Author: Jack Nicholson
Quote.QuoteValue: Frankly, I got into the movies because I like the movies a lot

Quote.Author: Jack Nicklaus
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, the biggest rival I had in my career was me

Quote.Author: Jack Nicklaus
Quote.QuoteValue: Resolve never to quit, never to give up, no matter what the situation

Quote.Author: Jack Nicklaus
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't be too proud to take lessons. I'm not

Quote.Author: Jack Nicklaus
Quote.QuoteValue: He has the finest, fundamentally sound golf swing I've ever seen

Quote.Author: Jack Nicklaus
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard not to play golf that's up to Jack Nicklaus standards when you are Jack Nicklaus

Quote.Author: Jack Nicklaus
Quote.QuoteValue: Focus on remedies, not faults

Quote.Author: Jack Nicklaus
Quote.QuoteValue: My ability to concentrate and work toward that goal has been my greatest asset

Quote.Author: Jack Nicklaus
Quote.QuoteValue: Concentration is a fine antidote to anxiety

Quote.Author: Jack Nicklaus
Quote.QuoteValue: The game is meant to be fun

Quote.Author: Jack Nicklaus
Quote.QuoteValue: Golf is a better game played downhill

Quote.Author: Jack Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: Control your own destiny or someone else will

Quote.Author: Jack Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: Number one, cash is king... number two, communicate... number three, buy or bury the competition

Quote.Author: Jack Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: Be candid with everyone

Quote.Author: Jack Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest cowards are managers who don't let people know where they stand

Quote.Author: Jack Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: The team with the best players wins

Quote.Author: Jack Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't have a competitive advantage, don't compete

Quote.Author: Jack Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: Change before you have to

Quote.Author: Jack Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: Management is all about managing in the short term, while developing the plans for the long term

Quote.Author: Jack Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: You measure your people and you take action on those that don't measure up

Quote.Author: Jack Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: Face reality as it is, not as it was or as you wish it to be

Quote.Author: Jackie Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: Coffee is a language in itself

Quote.Author: Jackie Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone can be a Superman, but nobody can be Jackie Chan

Quote.Author: Jackie Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: Now I am older, I understand we have to accept who we are

Quote.Author: Jackie Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I do need to go to karaoke, sometimes I need to relax

Quote.Author: Jackie Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: I never wanted to be the next Bruce Lee. I just wanted to be the first Jackie Chan

Quote.Author: Jackie Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: Before I do a stunt, I have to make sure it is safe

Quote.Author: Jackie Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm tired of fighting. I've always known that I can't be an action star all my life

Quote.Author: Jackie Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I'd like to play the bad guy and sometimes I'd like to die in a movie

Quote.Author: Jackie Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course I get hurt

Quote.Author: Jackie Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: In the real world, children love me

Quote.Author: Jackie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: The first time you marry for love, the second for money, and the third for companionship

Quote.Author: Jackie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to live my life, not record it

Quote.Author: Jackie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: The only routine with me is no routine at all

Quote.Author: Jackie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: If you bungle raising your children, I don't think whatever else you do matters very much

Quote.Author: Jackie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: There are many little ways to enlarge your child's world. Love of books is the best of all

Quote.Author: Jackie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll be a wife and mother first, then First Lady

Quote.Author: Jackie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think there are any men who are faithful to their wives

Quote.Author: Jackie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I want minimum information given with maximum politeness

Quote.Author: Jackie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: A camel makes an elephant feel like a jet plane

Quote.Author: Jackie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to have been a Republican to know how good it is to be a Democrat

Quote.Author: Jackie Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Above anything else, I hate to lose

Quote.Author: Jackie Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives

Quote.Author: Jackie Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: The right of every American to first-class citizenship is the most important issue of our time

Quote.Author: Jackie Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Pop flies, in a sense, are just a diversion for a second baseman. Grounders are his stock trade

Quote.Author: Jackie Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: This ain't fun. But you watch me, I'll get it done

Quote.Author: Jackie Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: How you played in yesterday's game is all that counts

Quote.Author: Jackie Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: There's not an American in this country free until every one of us is free

Quote.Author: Jackie Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: The most luxurious possession, the richest treasure anybody has, is his personal dignity

Quote.Author: Jackie Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: In all my years of baseball, I have always expected to be traded. I never liked the idea

Quote.Author: Jackie Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had been white with the things I did, they never would have allowed me to get out of baseball

Quote.Author: Jackson Pollock
Quote.QuoteValue: Painting is self-discovery. Every good artist paints what he is

Quote.Author: Jackson Pollock
Quote.QuoteValue: The strangeness will wear off and I think we will discover the deeper meanings in modern art

Quote.Author: Jackson Pollock
Quote.QuoteValue: Every good painter paints what he is

Quote.Author: Jackson Pollock
Quote.QuoteValue: I continue to get further away from the usual painter's tools such as easel, palette, brushes, etc

Quote.Author: Jackson Pollock
Quote.QuoteValue: My painting does not come from the easel

Quote.Author: Jackson Pollock
Quote.QuoteValue: I hardly ever stretch the canvas before painting

Quote.Author: Jackson Pollock
Quote.QuoteValue: When I am in my painting, I'm not aware of what I'm doing

Quote.Author: Jackson Pollock
Quote.QuoteValue: The painting has a life of its own. I try to let it come through

Quote.Author: Jackson Pollock
Quote.QuoteValue: Bums are the well-to-do of this day. They didn't have as far to fall

Quote.Author: Jackson Pollock
Quote.QuoteValue: He drove his kind of realism at me so hard I bounced right into nonobjective painting

Quote.Author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
Quote.QuoteValue: The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever

Quote.Author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
Quote.QuoteValue: People protect what they love

Quote.Author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
Quote.QuoteValue: Water and air, the two essential fluids on which all life depends, have become global garbage cans

Quote.Author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
Quote.QuoteValue: Farming as we do it is hunting, and in the sea we act like barbarians

Quote.Author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
Quote.QuoteValue: No sooner does man discover intelligence than he tries to involve it in his own stupidity

Quote.Author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
Quote.QuoteValue: We forget that the water cycle and the life cycle are one

Quote.Author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
Quote.QuoteValue: The sea is the universal sewer

Quote.Author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a scientist. I am, rather, an impresario of scientists

Quote.Author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
Quote.QuoteValue: The awareness of our environment came progressively in all countries with different outlets

Quote.Author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of people attack the sea, I make love to it

Quote.Author: Jada Pinkett Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: My belief is that communication is the best way to create strong relationships

Quote.Author: Jada Pinkett Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had my way, I'd wear jewelry, a great pair of heels and nothing else

Quote.Author: Jada Pinkett Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: When I believe in something, I'm very passionate. I don't take 'no' for an answer

Quote.Author: Jada Pinkett Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Women, you can have it all - a loving man, devoted husband, loving children, a fabulous career

Quote.Author: Jada Pinkett Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I think women who lead full lives are better mothers

Quote.Author: Jada Pinkett Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a thing for doors. I always think of them as a threshold to something new

Quote.Author: Jada Pinkett Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: For people to be able to sit down together and have a conversation, that's the power of love

Quote.Author: Jada Pinkett Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: What you're willing to sacrifice is the measurement of how you love - at least it is for me

Quote.Author: Jada Pinkett Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm tired, I rest. I say, 'I can't be a superwoman today.'

Quote.Author: Jada Pinkett Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I do a lot of reading, meditating, and praying to stay as grounded as I can be in this crazy world

Quote.Author: James Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Circumstances do not make the man, they reveal him

Quote.Author: James Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks

Quote.Author: James Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: For true success ask yourself these four questions: Why? Why not? Why not me? Why not now?

Quote.Author: James Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is mental harmony; unhappiness is mental inharmony

Quote.Author: James Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: You will become as small as your controlling desire; as great as you dominant aspiration

Quote.Author: James Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a process of diverting one's scattered forces into one powerful channel

Quote.Author: James Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Good thoughts bear good fruit, bad thoughts bear bad fruit

Quote.Author: James Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: The will to do springs from the knowledge that we can do

Quote.Author: James Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Harmony is one phase of the law whose spiritual expression is love

Quote.Author: James Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: A man is literally what he thinks

Quote.Author: James Altucher
Quote.QuoteValue: Honesty is the fastest way to prevent a mistake from turning into a failure

Quote.Author: James Altucher
Quote.QuoteValue: The American Dream never really existed. It was a marketing scam

Quote.Author: James Altucher
Quote.QuoteValue: Read every book, blog, website, whatever, about what you want to be an expert in

Quote.Author: James Altucher
Quote.QuoteValue: You can only make money doing what you love

Quote.Author: James Altucher
Quote.QuoteValue: Poker is a skill game pretending to be a chance game
